actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-620, by Mr. Reynolds.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 209.

official_title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

summary.text: Waives a specified requirement of rule XIII to provide for consideration or disposition of the conference report on H.R. 1308 (Tax Relief, Simplification, and Equity Act of 2003).

titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.
